Texts.Eng:
Beetle-like omnivorous bipeds with tough chitin plates and a love for the exuberant.
    
  Diet: Omnivorous 

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  +^green;5^reset; Protection, Max Food x^green;1.5^reset;
  +^green;30^reset;% Knockback Resistance
  Resist: ^green;20^reset;%Electric, Radioactive 

^orange;Environment^reset;: 
  ^green;Jungles, Deserts and Sulphuric^reset; biomes:
    Defense & Energy x^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;: 
  Short Spear/Short Sword (+Shield): Damage & Defense x^green;1.2^reset;
  Bow/Crossbow: Defense & Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Shield: +^green;2^reset;% Shield Bash, +^green;2^reset; Shield Push distance
  Perfect Block restores ^green;health and ^green;20^reset;% shield stamina^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  Poor traders (-^red;25^reset;% Charisma penalty)
  Resist: -^red;30^reset;% Fire, -^red;20^reset;% Ice
